fields.name: FlowError
fields.fieldText: Sorry an Error occurred. The cause of the Error is {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: FoundUser
fields.fieldText: User Id: {!UserID}

fields.name: ErrorDefendantAddress
fields.fieldText:
ERROR
The Defendant linked on this Wage Claim has no Street address associated with the account record. In order to refer this Wage Claim, please correct the data on the Defendant Record and resubmit.

fields.name: NoClaimantorDefendantSpecified
fields.fieldText:
ERROR
The wage claim that you are attempting to refer has either no Claimant or no Defendant specified. Please correct the data on the Wage Claim and try again.

fields.name: NoSeniorLaborCommissionerSet
fields.fieldText:
ERROR
The wage claim that you are attempting to refer does not have the Senior Deputy Labor Commissioner set. Please correct the data and try again.

fields.name: OrphanedAccountDisplay
fields.fieldText:
Orphaned Contact
The wage claimant is not associated to an account, so this claimant cannot be used ast a reporting party at this time. Please contact your system administrator for assistance in correcting the data associated with this claimant

fields.name: ReportingPartyAccountDebug
fields.fieldText: ReportingPartyAccountID: {!ReportingPartyAccountID}
